pullRequest.title: [lutron] Minor code and doc updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a minor update which contains the following:

Removes most uses of Apache Commons (except for Apache Commons Net)
Other minor code changes with no functional impact
Rationalizes thing labels and descriptions
Adds some roughly appropriate categories to things
Doc updates

commit.message:
[lutron] Minor code and doc updates

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>
